file_content.text: You there! Bounty hunter! We want a word with you.
You looking to hire me, or what?
Why?
Do I know you?
I'm Vorr. This is my sister Vye.
Take a number and get in line.
I'm busy, kids.
You see this blaster? It means we get to jump to the front of the line.
We've come to collect a debt from you, and we expect payment in full. We Corellians are very particular about our debts.
You killed our brother Vexx, you pile of scum! You got anything to say for yourself?
I don't remember any Vexx. But I've killed a lot of people.
Vexx?
Vexx had a bounty on him. I'm a bounty hunter. End of story.
He had it coming.
Walk away--both of you.
We're not afraid of you, and neither was Vexx. He was the galaxy's best gunfighter!
He was that Corellian bank robber on Hutta, right? The fast-draw guy.
You couldn't take him in a stand-up fight, so you shot him in the back! Now you're gonna pay the price.
The name Tarro Blood ring a bell? He told us how you slaughtered Vexx and then killed the old man, Braden, when he discovered your crime!
Braden... I can't believe even Tarro would stoop that low!
This pair of Corellians are nothing but Tarro's pawns.
He's playing these two.
Enough! Let's fry the scum and be done with it!
Only thing worse than lies are the people who repeat them.
I hate liars. [Attack]
It's a shame we can't kill you twice--once for Vexx and again for your mentor.
You two are nothing but Tarro's pawns.
You're making a big mistake.
Braden was more than just my mentor--he was my friend. Tarro killed him.
Tarro lied to you.
The only one getting fried here is you--and for nothing. You're going to die for a lie.
Tarro lied to you.
Hang on, Vye. What if the bounty hunter's telling the truth?
You'd take the word of this mongrel who killed our brother?
No, but I'm not sure I trust Tarro Blood, either. What if we're being used?
Tarro sent you to die.
There's no "if" about it.
Don't listen, Vorr! It's a trick!
Tarro sent other people after me, too. And they're all dead.
You wouldn't be the first.
Don't believe it, Vorr! He's trying to scare us off.
Leave while you still can.
Listen to how smug she is! She killed Vexx, there's no doubt about it!
He's so blasted smug about everything! It's obvious he killed Vexx!
What if he wasn't shot in the back? If this bounty hunter killed Vexx in a fair fight, what chance do we have?
You're smarter than you look, Vorr.
Can't argue with that logic.
If I'm gonna die, it ain't gonna be because I was too dumb to walk away. Let's go.
None--now beat it.
This isn't worth it, Vye--not anymore. I've got a bad feeling about this. Let's go.
But what about Vexx? We made a promise!
Our brother's dead. Getting ourselves killed won't change that. Come on....
Your whole family is too dumb to live.
Let's find out. [Attack]
You're dead!
You can try. [Attack]
